channel.title: Message editing... help appreciated! :)
channel.description:
ok so i just had a real quick couple of questions.
in the source i am using, on the quest tab and such there is text saying the server info. where would i go to edit this ?
also, how do i make the server display messegas like the website name? it already does this (but not with my website) because i downloaded someone elses source...
anyway help is much appreciated thank you!

item.title: Message editing... help appreciated! :)
item.dc:creator: @sneakyscape sneakyscape
item.description:
@sneakyscape wrote:

ok thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Message editing... help appreciated! :)
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

All of the these can be changed in client.java, do ctrl + f ann type in a line of whatever you quest tab says already, as for the forums. Just search again in client.java what it says when you log in and change that.
Edit: Wow it didn’t even tell me two new posts have been posted. Whatever, listen to what the guy above me said.

Read full topic

item.title: Message editing... help appreciated! :)

@sneakyscape wrote:

ok thanks ill look

Read full topic

item.title: Message editing... help appreciated! :)
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

  1. Texthandler.java or Client.java

  2. Client.java, search for the website it shows, than change it to yours.

Read full topic
